line.words: Knock, knock, knock! §Who's there?§ says the little white sheep. §It's me, the little black horse. Please come and help me.§ §Yes, I'll come straight away.§

line.words: So the two friends go back to the apple tree. The sheep sees the beautiful red apple. §Oh,§ says the little white sheep, §that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat that beautiful red apple.§

line.words: §Quick, quick,§ says the horse, §climb onto my back.§ The sheep climbs onto the horse's back. He tries to pick the apple but it's impossible!

line.words: Knock, knock, knock! §Who's there?§ says the little grey rabbit. §It's me, the little white sheep. Please come and help me.§ §Yes, I'll come straight away.§

line.words: So, the two friends go back to the apple tree. The rabbit sees the beautiful red apple. §Oh,§ says the little grey rabbit, §that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.§

line.words: §Quick, quick,§ says the white sheep, §climb onto my head.§ So, the sheep climbs onto the horse's back and the rabbit climbs on to the sheep's head. He tries to pick the apple but it's impossible!

line.words: §Hmmm,§ says the little grey rabbit, §I'll fetch my friend the mouse.§ The rabbit hops, the rabbit hops to the little brown mouse's house.

line.words: Knock, knock, knock! §Who is there?§ says the little brown mouse. §It's me, the little grey rabbit. Please come and help me.§ §Yes, I'll come straight away.§

line.words: The two friends go back to the apple tree. The mouse sees the beautiful red apple. §Oh,§ says the little brown mouse, §that's a beautiful red apple. I'd really like to eat the beautiful red apple.§

दोनों दोस्त सेब के पेड़ के पास वापस जाते हैं। चूहा सुंदर लाल सेब को देखता है। 'ओह,' छोटा भूरा चूहा कहता है, यह एक सुंदर लाल सेब है। मैं सच में इस सुंदर लाल सेब को खाना चाहता हूँ।

line.words: §Quick, quick,§ says the little grey rabbit, §climb onto my nose.§ So the sheep climbs onto the horse's back, the rabbit climbs onto the sheep's head and the mouse climbs onto the rabbit's nose.

line.words: §Hoorah!§ cries the little brown mouse and climbs down. §Hoorah!§ cries the little grey rabbit and climbs down. §Hoorah!§ cries the little white sheep and climbs down. §Hoorah!§ cries the little black horse.

Y la ratoncita café corretea de regreso hacia su casa. ¡Bye!
